Html:
Hi!

I've tried to play a 3d 360 video on my Smasung S4 Active but it doesn't work properly. When I try to play any video downloaded from
http://www.panocam3d.com/video3d360.html

I've got only sound but no video. Those videos (only 360, not 3d) are working fine: http://www.kolor.com/360-video/gallery
I've tried to set different play options in menu but there is no effect.

Any solutions for that?
